00062 void BdkPdfPolyn::init(const char * theName,
00063                        const char * theDesc,
00064                        RooRealVar& dependent,
00065                        Int_t lowestOrder,
00066                        Int_t highestOrder) {
00067   baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00068   useOffset(kTRUE);
00069   setDependent(dependent);
00070   setlowestOrder(lowestOrder);
00071   sethighestOrder(highestOrder);
00072   initParameters();
00073 }
00074 
00075 void BdkPdfPolyn::initParameters() {
00076   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00077   _offset = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".offset",
00078                           TString(GetTitle())+" Polynomial offset", 
00079                           0, -100., 100.);  
00080 
00081   _diff = new RooFormulaVar(TString(GetName())+ ".diff", 
00082                             TString(GetTitle()) + " offset", "@0-@1",  
00083                             RooArgList(*_dependent, *_offset)); 
00084 
00085   for(Int_t i=_lowestOrder; i<=_highestOrder;i++) {
00086         TString pdfname = TString(GetName()) + ".coef";
00087         pdfname += i ;
00088         RooRealVar *temp = new RooRealVar(pdfname,"coef", 1);
00089         temp->setConstant(kFALSE);
00090         temp->setError(0.01);
00091         _coefList.addOwned(*temp);
00092   } 
00093 }
00094 
00095 void BdkPdfPolyn::setDependent(RooRealVar & dependent) {
00096   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00097   _dependent = &dependent;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void BdkPdfPolyn::setlowestOrder(Int_t lowestOrder) {
00101    setIsValid(kFALSE);
00102    _lowestOrder = lowestOrder;
00103 } 
00104 
00105 void BdkPdfPolyn::sethighestOrder(Int_t highestOrder) {
00106    setIsValid(kFALSE);
00107    _highestOrder = highestOrder;
00108 }
00109         
00110 
00111 RooRealVar* BdkPdfPolyn::getCoef(Int_t n) {
00112   return (RooRealVar*)_coefList.at(n - _lowestOrder);
00113 }
00114  
00115 void BdkPdfPolyn::setcoefConst(Int_t n, Double_t val,Bool_t trfk ) {
00116   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00117   RooRealVar* tmp = getCoef(n);
00118    tmp->setConstant(trfk);
00119    tmp->setVal(val);
00120 }
00121 
00122 void BdkPdfPolyn::useOffset(Bool_t use) {
00123   _useOffset = use;
00124   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00125 }
00126 
00127 void BdkPdfPolyn::createPdf() { 
00128   RooAbsReal * var = _diff;
00129   if (kFALSE == _useOffset) {
00130     var = _dependent;
00131   }
00132 
00133   _thePdf =
00134     new RooPolynomial(TString(GetName())+".pdf", 
00135                       TString(GetTitle()) + ".Polyn",
00136                       *var, _coefList , _lowestOrder);
00137   
00138   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00139 }
00140 
00141 RooArgSet BdkPdfPolyn::dependents() {
00142   
00143   return RooArgSet(*_dependent);
00144 }
00145 
00146 void BdkPdfPolyn::linkParameters(const BdkPdfPolyn & pdf2) {
00147   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00148   setParameters(pdf2._coefList , pdf2._lowestOrder);
00149 }
00150 
00151 void BdkPdfPolyn::linkParameters(Int_t lowestOrder, Int_t highestOrder) {
00152   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00153   setlowestOrder(lowestOrder);
00154   sethighestOrder(highestOrder);
00155 }
00156         
00157 void BdkPdfPolyn::setParameters(const RooArgList & coefList,Int_t lowestOrder) {
00158   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00159   if ( coefList.getSize() > 0 ) {_coefList = coefList;}
00160   if ( lowestOrder >= 0 ) {_lowestOrder = lowestOrder;} 
00161   sethighestOrder(_coefList.getSize()+_lowestOrder+1);
00162 }
00163 
00164 Double_t BdkPdfPolyn::analyticalIntegral(Int_t code) 
00165 {
00166   return _thePdf->analyticalIntegral(code);
00167 }
